circle.style: fill: none; stroke: #1f456e; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 2;

line.style: fill: none; stroke: #ff6c00; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 2;
fill: none; stroke: #ff6c00; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 2;
